name: Laser Wars - Guns Combat Games
description:
Do you love Gun FPS Multiplayer Games? you can join to the laser combat here, select your team and join the room and shoot other team player.

Feature
- Very fun of Laser Gun style!
- Join the room and you can select your team.
- Upgrade new gun & shield with new style and more powerful.
- Free gun to pick up in the game

Download Free Today! Free game in limited time!

We are waiting for you to join our team. See you in the games.

Game Production From
Pixel Favor Company Limited
